de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater

Class InflaterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.InflaterFactory

  • public final class InflaterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the type Inflater.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Inflater createInflater(View view)
      Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createInflater

        public static Inflater createInflater(View view)
        Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.
        Parameters:
        view - The view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        Returns:
        The inflater, which has been created, as an instance of the type Inflater. The inflater may not be null
